globaldefs::ProcessingFailureException Exception Reference

import "globaldefs.idl";

List of all members.

Public Attributes

ExceptionType_T exceptionType
string errorReason

Detailed Description

A coarse grain approach is adopted for capturing exceptions as well. This has the advantage of making the catching of exceptions fairly generic. Since CORBA does not allow as in the Java language to subclass exceptions, it is recommended to reduce the number of exceptions a client may catch. On the down side, a client may need to write explicit code when an exception is thrown by the server (i.e. a client may have a switch statement on the ExceptionType. ExceptionType See ExceptionType
errorReason A string indicating further details about the exception. It is a free format string filled by the EMS Server.
